deco2800.arcade.pong

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • deco2800.arcade.pong.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends java.lang.Object
    A basic implementation of the ball class, responsible for the behaviour of the ball including movement, bouncing, dimensions and positioning
    Author:
    uqjstee8

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball()
        Basic constructor for Ball. Set position and dimensions to the default

    • Method Detail

      • setVelocity

        public void setVelocity(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 newVelocity)
        Modify the velocity of the ball
        Parameters:
        newVelocity - the new velocity of ball as x,y

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 newPosition)
        Modify the position of the ball
        Parameters:
        newPosition - the new position of the ball as x,y

      • bounceX

        public void bounceX()
        Reverse the X direction of the ball when bouncing off the left or right paddle. Each bounce off a paddle changes the speed of the ball.
        See Also:
        deco2800.arcade.pong.Ball.BOUNCEINCREMENT

      • move

        public void move(float time)
        Move the ball according to its current velocity over the given time period.
        Parameters:
        time - the time elapsed in seconds

      • bounceY

        public void bounceY()
        Reverse the Y component of the ball's direction due to bouncing off the top or bottom wall. Note that since this is not because of a paddle, it does not affect the speed of the ball.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the ball to its initial position and velocity

      • setColor

        public void setColor(float r,
            float g,
            float b,
            float a)
        Set the colour of the rendered ball.
        Parameters:
        r - Red (0-1)
        g - Green (0-1)
        b - Blue (0-1)
        a - Alpha (0-1)

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShapeRenderer shapeRenderer)
        Render the ball.
        Parameters:
        shapeRenderer - The current ShapeRenderer instance.

      • randomizeVelocity

        public void randomizeVelocity()
        Generate and assign a random velocity to the ball. The straight-line speed is constant but the X/Y components are randomly determined.
